hanging-church-courtyard-north-view.title: Hanging Church Courtyard - North View
hanging-church-courtyard-north-view.description: Narrow courtyard decorated with modern biblical art designs leading to the Hanging Church.

hanging-church-courtyard-south-view.title: Hanging Church Courtyard - South View
hanging-church-courtyard-south-view.description: Narrow courtyard decorated with wooden carvings leading to the Hanging Church.

hanging-church.title: Hanging Church
hanging-church.description: Saint Virgin Mary's Coptic Orthodox Church also known as the Hanging Church (El Muallaqa) is one of the oldest churches in Egypt and the history of a church on this site dates to the 3rd century AD.

parent.title: The Hanging Church
parent.description: Saint Virgin Mary's Coptic Orthodox Church also known as the Hanging Church (El Muallaqa) is one of the oldest churches in Egypt and the history of a church on this site dates to the 3rd century AD.
